short_summary: Application Services for the Service Digital Group
description: Transport Canada est a la recherche des consultants qualifís for the provision of the following professional services under Stream 1 - Application Services.
full_summary:
### Application Services Resources for the Service & Digital Group

#### Tender Reference Information
* **Reference Number**: CB-446-11699974
* **Amendment Number**: 7
* **Solicitation Number**: T8080-230303
* **Publication Date**: 2024-03-13
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-04-19T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-04-19
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-05-01
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-04-30

#### Tender Details
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **UNSPSC Code**: 80101507 (Information technology consultation services)
* **Trade Agreements**: Apply to suppliers that are registered under the following trade agreements:
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

#### Tender Documents
Tenderers can obtain the full tender documents by accessing the following links:
* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34010/t8080-230303---application-services---tier-2---march-13%2C-2024.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34010/t8080-230303---ressources-de-services-dapplication-pour-le-groupe-des-services-numeriques---pailer-2---le-13-mars-2024.pdf

#### Contact Information
For more information about this tender, please contact:
Sara Gould
Email: Sara.Gould
